about_the_game:
Step into the world of Ballardo, where classic pool meets innovative roguelike strategy! Plan your shots, aim for high scores, and customize your gameplay with powerful upgrades and abilities. With endless replayability and a unique blend of skill and strategy, Ballardo offers an exciting new way to enjoy billiards.

Core Features:

  • Classic Pool Gameplay: Intuitive mechanics that are familiar yet refreshing.

  • Roguelike Progression: Surpass target scores to advance through increasingly challenging stages.

  • Stickers and Relics: Boost your balls or transform the game dynamics with stickers and relics.

  • Dynamic Scoring System: Earn points through pocketing, bouncing, and comboing balls with precision.

  • Shop Between Stages: Spend your hard-earned coins on upgrades, items, and packs to adapt to your strategy.

  • Stylish Visuals: A clean, modern take on billiard aesthetics.

Planned Features:

  • Additional modes like Snooker and Standard Billiards.

  • Expanded collection of stickers, relics, and items for endless gameplay variety.

  • Leaderboards to compete globally and with friends.

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Strategic Customization: Attach stickers to balls to enhance stats, add special abilities, or change appearances.

  • Relic Effects: Unlock passive abilities like bonus points, table alterations, or unique scoring opportunities.

  • Skill-Based Challenges: Use precise aiming and shot power to outmaneuver each challenge.

  • Unique Encounters: From creative maps to high-stakes boss stages, every level offers new surprises.

Score System:

  • Pocket the right balls for high multipliers, but beware of penalties for wrong shots.

  • Combine bounces, pockets, and zones for exponential scoring rewards.

  • Use skill and strategy to maximize every turn and achieve high scores.

Relics and Stickers:

  • Relics: Passive items that twist gameplay, such as moving pockets, explosive impacts, or bonus coin rewards.

  • Stickers: Custom upgrades for balls that modify stats, add abilities, or change appearances with unique costumes.

Join the Community:

Stay updated on development progress and share your feedback!

  • Follow us on Twitter and Discord for updates.

  • Wishlist Ballardo now to be notified on release day!
